mapper.sql: select id, dept_id, project_id, temporary_code, original_code, category_id, category_name, brand_id, brand_name, material_id, asset_name, specification, asset_status, production_time, location_id, location_name, managed_dept_Id, managed_dept_name, using_dept_Id, using_dept_name, managed_emp_Id, managed_emp_name, using_emp_Id, using_emp_name, collector_user_id, collector_user_name, collector_time, remark, main_image_url, main_image_name, image_url, image_url_name, delete_flag, created_by_id, created_by_name, created_time, updated_by_id, updated_by_name, updated_time from asset as a
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS collectionCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN original_code IS NOT NULL AND original_code != '' THEN 1 END) AS matchCount FROM asset where delete_flag = 0 and project_id = #{projectId}

mapper.update:
update asset
dept_id = #{deptId},
project_id = #{projectId},
temporary_code = #{temporaryCode},
original_code = #{originalCode},
category_id = #{categoryId},
category_name = #{categoryName},
brand_id = #{brandId},

material_id = #{materialId},

main_image_name = #{mainImageName},

created_by_name = #{createdByName},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_by_id = #{updatedById},
updated_by_name = #{updatedByName},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
where id = #{id}
